content:
I can tell you that there are several promising young players on the dallas cowboys that have shown potential to become impactful nfl players:

1. ceedee lamb - the cowboys' first-round draft pick in 2020, lamb has already shown flashes of brilliance, tallying several impressive catches and scoring 3 touchdowns in the team's first eight games.

2. trevon diggs - the team's second-round pick in the same draft, diggs has shown promise as a cornerback, with his impressive size, speed, and ball skills.

3. neville gallimore - drafted in the third round of the 2020 draft, gallimore is a promising defensive tackle who has shown disruptive ability at times this season.

4. connor williams - a third-round pick in the 2018 draft, williams has shown improvement as an offensive guard, and has the potential to develop into a solid starting lineman in the nfl.

5. leighton vander esch - drafted in the first round in 2018, vander esch has had some injury concerns but has also shown pro bowl-caliber talent, and has the potential to be an impact player for the dallas cowboys.

these young players represent the future of the dallas cowboys and give fans reasons for hope as they continue to develop and grow in the nfl.
